Sheet.name: R1-CHEM
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,a.total+o.outTotal-i.inTotal opening, i.inVendor,i.inCharges,i.inInterlab,i.inSponsor, i.inTotal, o.outDiscard,o.outIntelLab,o.outOthre,o.outSponsor,o.outTrialTest,o.outValidation,o.outTotal,a.total closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,p.localprice,a.total*p.localprice,null as remark, i.inTotal*p.localprice qtyIn,o.outTotal*p.localprice qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, 0 pqtyIn,0 pqtyOut, 0 cqtyIn,0 cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY vin.catid WITH ROLLUP )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(o.outOthre) outOthre, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(o.outOthre)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY o.catid WITH ROLLUP )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid where date('2014-01-01') != ? and date('2014-01-01') != ?

Sheet.name: R2-LCMS_Micro
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,a.total+o.outTotal-i.inTotal opening, i.inVendor,i.inCharges,i.inInterlab,i.inSponsor, i.inTotal, o.outDiscard,o.outIntelLab,o.outOthre,o.outSponsor,o.outTrialTest,o.outValidation,o.outTotal,a.total closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,p.localprice,a.total*p.localprice,null as remark, i.inTotal*p.localprice qtyIn,o.outTotal*p.localprice qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, 0 pqtyIn,0 pqtyOut, 0 cqtyIn,0 cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY vin.catid WITH ROLLUP )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(o.outOthre) outOthre, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(o.outOthre)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY o.catid WITH ROLLUP )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid where date('2014-01-01') != ? and date('2014-01-01') != ?

Sheet.name: R3-Hema_Flow
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,a.total+o.outTotal-i.inTotal opening, i.inVendor,i.inCharges,i.inInterlab,i.inSponsor, i.inTotal, o.outDiscard,o.outIntelLab,o.outOthre,o.outSponsor,o.outTrialTest,o.outValidation,o.outTotal,a.total closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,p.localprice,a.total*p.localprice,null as remark, i.inTotal*p.localprice qtyIn,o.outTotal*p.localprice qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, 0 pqtyIn,0 pqtyOut, 0 cqtyIn,0 cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY vin.catid WITH ROLLUP )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(o.outOthre) outOthre, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(o.outOthre)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY o.catid WITH ROLLUP )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid where date('2014-01-01') != ? and date('2014-01-01') != ?

Sheet.name: R8-Cent_Immu_Liai_Mini
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,a.total+o.outTotal-i.inTotal opening, i.inVendor,i.inCharges,i.inInterlab,i.inSponsor, i.inTotal, o.outDiscard,o.outIntelLab,o.outOthre,o.outSponsor,o.outTrialTest,o.outValidation,o.outTotal,a.total closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,p.localprice,a.total*p.localprice,null as remark, i.inTotal*p.localprice qtyIn,o.outTotal*p.localprice qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, 0 pqtyIn,0 pqtyOut, 0 cqtyIn,0 cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY vin.catid WITH ROLLUP )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(o.outOthre) outOthre, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(o.outOthre)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY o.catid WITH ROLLUP )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid where date('2014-01-01') != ? and date('2014-01-01') != ?

Sheet.name: R9-Elisa
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,a.total+o.outTotal-i.inTotal opening, i.inVendor,i.inCharges,i.inInterlab,i.inSponsor, i.inTotal, o.outDiscard,o.outIntelLab,o.outOthre,o.outSponsor,o.outTrialTest,o.outValidation,o.outTotal,a.total closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,p.localprice,a.total*p.localprice,null as remark, i.inTotal*p.localprice qtyIn,o.outTotal*p.localprice qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, 0 pqtyIn,0 pqtyOut, 0 cqtyIn,0 cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY vin.catid WITH ROLLUP )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(o.outOthre) outOthre, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(o.outOthre)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY o.catid WITH ROLLUP )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid where date('2014-01-01') != ? and date('2014-01-01') != ?

Sheet.name: Lab_Gen_Supplier
Sheet.sql: SELECT a.id,a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineNo,a.machineName,a.total+o.outTotal-i.inTotal opening, i.inVendor,i.inCharges,i.inInterlab,i.inSponsor, i.inTotal, o.outDiscard,o.outIntelLab,o.outOthre,o.outSponsor,o.outTrialTest,o.outValidation,o.outTotal,a.total closing, p.CNY,p.EUR,p.GBP,p.SGD,p.USD,p.localprice,a.total*p.localprice,null as remark, i.inTotal*p.localprice qtyIn,o.outTotal*p.localprice qtyOut, 0 checkQty,0 checkAmt, 0 pqtyIn,0 pqtyOut, 0 cqtyIn,0 cqtyOut from b_cat a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(vin.catid, 0) catid, SUM(vin.inVendor) inVendor, SUM(vin.inCharges) inCharges, SUM(vin.inInterlab) inInterlab, SUM(vin.inSponsor) inSponsor, SUM(vin.inVendor) + SUM(vin.inCharges) + SUM(vin.inInterlab) + SUM(vin.inSponsor) inTotal FROM r_in_view vin WHERE vin.indate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY vin.catid WITH ROLLUP )i on a.id = i.catid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifnull(o.catid, 0) catid, SUM(o.outDiscard) outDiscard, SUM(o.outIntelLab) outIntelLab, SUM(o.outOthre) outOthre, SUM(o.outSponsor) outSponsor, SUM(o.outTrialTest)outTrialTest , SUM(o.outValidation) outValidation, SUM(o.outDiscard) + SUM(o.outIntelLab)+SUM(o.outOthre)+SUM(o.outSponsor)+SUM(o.outTrialTest)+SUM(o.outValidation) outTotal FROM r_out_view o WHERE o.outdate BETWEEN DATE('2014-01-01') AND DATE('2015-01-01') GROUP BY o.catid WITH ROLLUP )o on a.id=o.catid LEFT JOIN r_price_view p ON a.id=p.catid where date('2014-01-01') != ? and date('2014-01-01') != ?

Sheet.name: CTM_Suppliers_DTW
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: Discard_CLab
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: Validation_CLab
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: R10-Oncology
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: Discard_APLab
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: Validation_APLab
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname
